actions.label: Retain Engineer
actions.definition: Client engages professional engineer for specific technical services
actions.purpose: Prepare environmental report and design documents
actions.source_text: Engineer A... was retained by Client W to prepare a comprehensive report

actions.label: Select AI Tools
actions.definition: Decision to use AI software for report drafting and design generation
actions.source_text: Engineer A opted to use open-sourced artificial intelligence (AI) software

actions.label: Upload Client Data to AI
actions.definition: Input client-provided information into open-source AI software
actions.source_text: Engineer A input the information gathered from Client W into the AI software

actions.label: Generate AI Draft Report
actions.definition: Use AI to create initial draft of technical report
actions.method: Prompting AI software with gathered information
actions.source_text: after a few refining prompts, received a first draft of the report generated by the AI software

actions.label: Verify Report Content
actions.definition: Cross-check AI-generated report against professional sources
actions.source_text: Engineer A conducted a thorough review of the report, cross-checking key facts

actions.label: Generate AI Design Documents
actions.definition: Use AI-assisted drafting tools to create preliminary engineering designs
actions.source_text: relied on the AI-assisted drafting tools to generate a preliminary design of the plans

actions.label: Cursory Design Review
actions.definition: High-level review of AI-generated design documents with limited scrutiny
actions.source_text: Engineer A completed a cursory review of the AI-generated plans

actions.label: Apply Professional Seal
actions.definition: Affix professional engineering seal to draft documents
actions.source_text: applied their seal consistent with state law

actions.label: Submit Deliverables
actions.definition: Provide draft report and design documents to client for review
actions.disclosure: Identified as draft, did not disclose AI use
actions.source_text: submitted the draft report to Client W for review

actions.label: Client Review and Feedback
actions.definition: Client examination of deliverables and identification of issues

findings.report: Minor edits needed, noted dual-author quality difference

actions.source_text: Client W noted that the section analyzing the groundwater monitoring data would benefit from minor edits

actions.label: Request Design Revision
actions.definition: Client instruction to revise plans to meet standards
actions.scope: Ensure all elements satisfy professional and regulatory standards
actions.source_text: instructed Engineer A to revise the plans

events.label: Engineer B Retirement
events.definition: Mentor and supervisor becomes unavailable for professional guidance
events.impact: Loss of quality assurance review support
events.source_text: Engineer B recently retired and was no longer available to Engineer A

events.label: AI Software Market Introduction
events.definition: New AI drafting software becomes available on the market
events.source_text: The AI drafting software was new to the market

events.label: Design Deficiency Discovery
events.definition: Client identifies errors in AI-generated engineering designs
events.source_text: Client W noticed several issues with the AI-generated design documents

events.label: Quality Discrepancy Observation
events.definition: Client notices difference in writing quality between report sections
events.observation: Report reads as if written by two different authors
events.source_text: The Client commented that the report read as if written by two different authors
